title: Maddy Loves to March
description: Maddy loves to march all around her house and outside. One day she has an opportunity to march with a real band in a parade. Supportive pictures and repetitive phrases support early readers.
meta: band, door, march, parade, stairs, street
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Capitalization : Recognize and understand the use of capital letters at the beginning of a sentence and in proper nouns
Position Words : Identify and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
